name: Maxwell

ingredients.item: ml Brut Champagne or other sparkling wine (about 1 split bottle)

preparation:
Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a large shaker and fill with ice.
Shake well for 10 seconds and double-strain into two flutes.
Top each with Champagne and chill the rest of the bottle in an ice bucket.
While drinking, top with more Champagne as needed.
